properties.title: New Study Looks at Future of Appalachian Energy Development
properties.description: A new study and online mapping tool assesses energy development potential and trends of wind, shale gas, and coal and possible overlap with important natural resources.
properties.caption: APPLCC Energy Mapping

properties.title: Riparian Restoration Tool Promotes Climate Change Resilience
properties.description: An innovative riparian planting and restoration tool allows managers to identify and prioritize areas along the banks of rivers, streams, and lakes for restoration.
properties.caption: APPLCC Lynn Camp Prong Smoky NP

properties.title: Tennessee River Basin is Focus of Conservation Planning Efforts
properties.description: Due to the immense biodiversity of native and endangered species, the Tennessee River Basin is the focus of a regional conservation planning effort engaging many stakeholders.
properties.caption: APPLCC TRB Partnership

properties.title: Working to Enhance Information on Protected Areas
properties.description: The Protected Areas Conservation Action Team provides guidance to support the establishment and management of protected areas systems in the U.S. Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico.
properties.location: In between Puerto Rico and the US Virgin Islands
properties.caption: CARLCC Protected Marine and Terrestrial Areas

properties.title: Island-Wide Downscaled Climate Projections for Puerto Rico
properties.description: A scientific partnership between the Caribbean LCC and the USGS Southeast Climate Science Center complete Puerto Rico’s first island-wide downscaled climate projections,
properties.caption: CALCC Climate Projections

properties.title: Prioritizing grasslands in south-central U.S.
properties.description: New Grassland Decision Support Tool helps partners find the best places to invest for conservation.
properties.location: North/central TX, anywhere in green space: http://www.opjv.org/#!ecoregions/c10d6
properties.caption: GCPLCC Nobo

properties.title: Inundation Frequency data for 180 million acres
properties.description: Innovative dataset provides fisheries/land managers with “desktop” assessment of floodplain habitat over time.
properties.location: Center of the GCPO, very near or on the Mississippi River.
properties.caption: Atchafalaya basin flooded

properties.title: Putting future change into conservation planning
properties.description: New tool predicts “pinch points” where sea level rise/urbanization could eliminate saltmarsh or mangrove systems.
properties.location: On the Gulf Coast at the AL/FL border
properties.caption: Grand Bay march edge

properties.title: Project assists delisting of Interior Least Tern
properties.description: An 18-state rangewide monitoring plan aims to meet delisting criteria while also saving federal dollars.
properties.location: Where the northern border of Arkansas meets Oklahoma
properties.caption: Interior least tern
properties.theme: Saving Dollars & Improving Efficiencies/ Buildling on Existing Partnerships

properties.title: The Lower St. Johns River – A Special Integration Zone Between Two Bordering LCCs
properties.description: This Special Integration Zone between the Peninsular Florida LCC and the South Atlantic LCC provides additional opportunity for the neighboring LCCs to work together across the landscape, in a region that has been identified as a priority in both LCCs through their respective blueprint processes.
properties.caption: PFLCC St. Johns River Special Integration Zone

properties.title: Building on Existing Resources to Create a Statewide Common Vision and Coordinated Conservation Efforts.
properties.description: The Peninsular Florida LCC aims to build upon Florida’s State Wildlife Action Plan, Florida’s Cooperative Conservation Blueprint (CCB), the Critical Lands and Water Identification Project (CLIP) and other resources already in existence to create a comprehensive vision to coordinate efforts across peninsular Florida.
properties.location: Center of PFLCC geography for now
properties.caption: PFLCC FLorida Critical Lands and Water Identification Map

properties.title: New initiative: the Florida Strategic Plan for Sustaining Military Readiness through Conservation Partnerships
properties.description: The Peninsular Florida LCC is partnering with the U.S. Air Force, U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, University of Florida, Florida Natural Areas Inventory, The Nature Conservancy, and the National Wildlife Refuge Association on this new initiative that will result in the development of landscape-level planning for Air Force installations in Florida that are in line with strategic conservation plans recommended by the Peninsular Florida LCC and other partners.
properties.caption: PFLCC U.S. Air Force

properties.title: Landscape Conservation and Climate Change Scenarios for the State of Florida
properties.description: The science focus of the Peninsular Florida LCC is to enhance conservation planning in Florida by investigating a number of possible trajectories of future landscape transformation; consequently, a decision support system for strategic conservation has been developed, with a tool to generate visualizations of land cover condition of three alternative futures for Florida in 2020, 2040 and 2060
properties.caption: PFLCC Great egret and tower at Big Bend WMA

properties.title: South Atlantic LCC links conservation to planning
properties.description: A new project will refine urban conservation priorities and strengthen relationships with Southeast planners.
properties.caption: Atlanta Midtown Skyline, Piedmont Park

properties.title: Blueprint brings new longleaf fire funds
properties.description: The South Atlantic LCC helps secure $800,000 supporting prescribed fire in longleaf pine focus areas.
properties.caption: SALCC Longleaf pine prescribed burn
properties.credit: USDA FS Southern Research Station Archive

properties.title: Partnering to Preserve Precious Aquatic Resources in the Southeast
properties.description: SARP and LCCs are developing dynamic geospatial plans to meet conservation goals to maximize effectiveness of conservation actions in the face of future landscape changes.
properties.caption: SARP Devil's river state Natural Area, Texas

properties.title: Restoring Connectivity of Southern Rivers and Streams
properties.description: The Southeast Aquatic Connectivity Assessment Project uses a database and web-based decision support tool to prioritize dams for removal or passage.
properties.caption: SARP Mill Creek, Tennessee
